name: Wordslide
description:
Skateboarding meets spelling!

While you can play directly on itch.io, I recommend downloading the installs for a crisper / prettier experience. HAVE FUN!

Goal
  • Collect letters
  • When you have a word, click the Left Mouse Buttonto claim it
  • Every time you claim a word, your combo increases
  • Collect words quickly to keep your combo alive
Controls
  • Move - Arrow Keys (or WASD)
  • Camera - Mouse
  • Jump - Spacebar
  • Claim Word - Left Mouse Button
